document.text:
From: 
To:' 
Subject: RE: Subpoena request 
Date: Fri, 27 Sep 2019 14:44:33 +0000 
Hi, unfortunately we can't provide it to you directly but if you request it from OCME they will be able to provide it to you. 
Let me know if you need a contact (Florence Hutner, their GC, is the right person - Hutner, Florence (OCME) 
From 
Sent: Friday, September 27, 2019 9:28 AM 
To: 
Subject: Re: Subpoena request 
Are you guys able to turn over the requested documents yet. I'm still waiting to close this case out. 
On Aug 19, 2019, at 12:13 PM, wrote: 
Hi 
We are requesting that information today and will give it to you when we get it. 
In the meantime, we had heard that the Marshals may have a form that Epstein may have/may not have signed noting 
he had suicidal tendencies, and this happened around 8/1. Do you know anything about this? 
Give me a call with any questions, thanks. 
From: 
Sent: Monday, August 19, 2019 11:55 AM 
To: 
Subject: FW: Subpoena request 
From: 
Sent: Monday, August 19, 2019 11:48 AM 
To: 
Subject: FW: Subpoena request 
AUSA 
advised that I should reach out to you guys for the below: 
We need to obtain a copy of the death certificate and autopsy report to close out Jeffrey Epstein's case. Can I please get 
subpoenas for both? 
Death Certificate: 
Office Of Vital Records 
Bureau of Vital Statistics 
EFTA00019697

New York City Department of Health and Mental Hygiene 
Autopsy Report: 
New York City Office of Chief Medical Examiner 
You can use my info for the return: 
Thank you 
Supervisory Deputy U.S. Marshal 
Southern District of New York 
EFTA00019698
